sentences.en: A born magpie, Mandy collects any object that catches her eye.
sentences.cn: 曼迪天生喜欢收集小玩意，只要是她看上的都会收藏起来。

sentences.en: A magpie rests on the power line.
A magpie was screeching and I said: Magpiety?
sentences.cn: 尖叫的是喜鹊,我却说: 喜鹊啼?

sentences.en: Jesse: Mum. Look. There's a magpie.
sentences.cn: 杰西: 妈妈, 看呀, 有一只喜鹊!

sentences.en: Magpie, the implication is happy, always very popular.
sentences.cn: 喜鹊, 有喜庆的寓意, 历来很受欢迎.

sentences.en: Mother: Oh, yes. Good morning, Mr. Magpie.
sentences.cn: 妈妈: 噢, 真的! 早上好, 喜鹊先生.

sentences.en: Now and then a magpie would call.
One old magpie began wrapping itself up very carefully.
sentences.cn: 一只老喜鹊非常小心地用羽毛裹紧自己的身体.

sentences.en: Superstitious people believe that the sight of magpie is a good omen.
sentences.cn: 迷信的说法认为看见喜鹊是祥瑞的征兆.

sentences.en: The magpie is lucky bird therefore also by intention.
sentences.cn: 喜鹊因此也被人意为吉祥鸟.

sentences.en: The magpie's call is considered to be an auspicious symbol.
sentences.cn: 喜鹊枝头叫,真是大吉大利啊!

sentences.en: The moon magpie, wind, not in packaging.
sentences.cn: 月亮的喜鹊, 风, 而不是在包装.

sentences.en: There is a magpie on the tree.
This is a magpie and that's a nightingale.
sentences.cn: 这是只喜鹊,那是一只夜莺.

sentences.en: This young man is really a magpie.

words.tran_cn: 鹊的；有收集癖的；斑驳的，混杂的
鹊，喜鹊；饶舌的人；有收集零碎东西癖好的人

trans.tran_cn: 鹊的；有收集癖的；斑驳的，混杂的
喜鹊，饶舌者，有收集零碎东西癖好的人，爱说话的人
trans.tran_en: a bird with black and white feathers and a long tail
